reviewText: If you enjoy upland bird hunting, you will love this DVD; watching Hank work is a pure joy!
Got 1 & 2 for Christmas.they're fantastic.can't wait to get all of them
Best wingshooting TV program I've ever seen, with a good mix of scenery, birds, dogs and humor.  Always remember don't spoil your bird dog.

I was really glad to find out the episodes were being offered on DVD...  my kids and I have been enjoying the original OLN recordings on an ancient TiVo for years :-)  Now we can enjoy all the Seasons without the advertisements.
